column6: James Patterson's Worldwide Bestselling Series gets a Marvel makeover. Follow the soaring adventures of Max and her extraordinary "flock"--Fang, Iggy, Nudge, Gasman and Angel--as they try to escape their creators and defend themselves from the diabolical Erasers. Along the way Max discovers her purpose â€" saving the world â€" but can she? Find out this Spring!
